sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "game_history" (
	"id" serial PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"word" text NOT NULL,
	"category" text NOT NULL,
	"guessed_letters" text[] NOT NULL,
	"won" boolean NOT NULL,
	"created_at" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "current_game" (
	"id" serial PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"word" text NOT NULL,
	"category" text NOT NULL,
	"guessed_letters" text[] NOT NULL,
	"created_at" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"updated_at" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL
);

CREATE TYPE "difficulty" AS ENUM ('normal', 'easy');
ALTER TABLE "game_history" ADD COLUMN "difficulty" "difficulty" DEFAULT 'normal' NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE "game_history" ALTER COLUMN "difficulty" DROP DEFAULT;
ALTER TABLE "game_history" ALTER COLUMN "difficulty" TYPE "difficulty" USING "difficulty"::text::"difficulty";
ALTER TABLE "game_history" ALTER COLUMN "difficulty" SET DEFAULT 'normal';
